text: Denshi Sentai Denjiman is a Japanese television series. It is the 4th in Toei's Super Sentai series. It was broadcast from February 2, 1980 to January 31, 1981. Denjiman is the first Super Sentai series entirely produced by Toei, since Gorenger and J.A.K.Q. were co-produced with Ishimori Productions and Battle Fever J was co-produced with Marvel Comics. ==Plot== 3,000 years ago, the Vader Clan, led by Queen Hedrian, devastated the planet Denji. Denji Land, an island from Denji, landed on Earth. in modern times, the computer of Denji Land awoke the Denji Dog IC when it detected the Vader Clan approaching Earth. IC found five young people (who may or may not be descendants of the Denji people) to become Denjiman in order to defend Earth, the Vader Clan's next target. ==Characters== ===Denjiman=== Actor Name Rangers Shinichi Yuki Ippei Akagi Denji Red Kenji Ohba Daigoro Oume Denji Blue Eiichi Tsuyama Jun Kiyama Denji Yellow Naoya Uchida Tatsuya Midorikawa Denji Green Akira Koizumi Akira Momoi Denji Pink ==Cast== * Ippei Akagi / Denji Red: Shinichi Yuki * Daigoro Oume / Denji Blue: Kenji Ohba * Jun Kiyama / Denji Yellow: Eiichi Tsuyama * Tatsuya Midorikawa / Denji Green: Naoya Uchida * Akira Momoi / Denji Pink: Akira Koizumi * Denji Dog IC (Voice): Hisako Ky≈çda * Princess Denji: Tamaki Funakura ==Songs== ; Opening theme * "Ah Denshi Sentai Denjiman" ("Oh Denshi Sentai Denjiman") ** Lyrics: Kazuo Koike ** Composition & Arrangement: Michiaki Watanabe ** Artist: Ken Narita, Koorogi '73 ; Ending theme * "Denjiman ni Makasero!" ("Believe it to Denjiman!") ** Lyrics: Kazuo Koike ** Composition & Arrangement: Michiaki Watanabe ** Artist: Ken Narita Category:Super Sentai series Category:1980 television series debuts Category:1981 television series endings Category:1981 disestablishments in Asia
title: Denshi Sentai Denjiman
